artciles.q: Which of the following is the acronym for GAMESS?
option: General Atomic and Molecular Electronic Structure System
Geometric Atomic and Molecular Electronic Structure System
Geometric Atomic and Molecular Electrical Structural System
General Atomic and Molecular Electrical Structure System
artciles.answer: General Atomic and Molecular Electronic Structure System
artciles.description: General Atomic and Molecular Electronic Structure System (GAMESS (US)) is computer software for computational chemistry program.

option: GAMESS is computer software for computational chemistry program
artciles.answer: GAMESS is computer software for computational chemistry program
artciles.description: GAMESS is computer software for computational chemistry program and GAMESS (US) source code is available as source-available freeware, but is not open-source software
Computational chemistry is a branch of chemistry that uses computer simulation to assist in solving chemical problems.

artciles.q: Which of the following computer programs does not carry out ab initio calculations ?
artciles.description: The two most popular computer programs for carrying out ab initio quantum chemical calculations is the 'Gaussian' and 'Gamess' series.

artciles.q: Z-matrix calculation is based on (i) bond distance (ii) bond number (iii) bond angle (iv) dihedral angle (v) trihedral angle
artciles.description: The Z-Matrix is a simple, geometrical approximation. It works by identifying each atom in a molecule by a bond distance, bond angle and dihedral angle (the so called internal coordinates) in relation to other atoms in the molecule.
The chemical formula of formaldehyde is CH2O: it has one carbon (C) atom, two hydrogen (H) atoms and one oxygen (O) atom. Its chemical formula can also be written as HCHO
Buckminsterfullerene, an allotrope of carbon with the chemical formula C60, also known as a buckyball

artciles.q: The number of normal modes of a nonlinear molecule with 'n' atoms can be calculated by
artciles.description: For a molecule of n atoms, the number of normal modes is (3n-6) if the molecule taken is nonlinear and it is (3n-5) if the molecule is linear.
Ab initio means 'from first principles' or 'from the beginning', implying that the only inputs into an ab initio calculation are physical constants

artciles.q: How many imaginaryfrequencies are there for any tranisition state?
artciles.description: A transition state for any molecule would have only one imaginary frequency. If the symmetry of the molecule is restrained it gives more than one imaginary frequency during optimization.
